name: VIR-238.02 Verify that the admin shoppers can view orders placed by admin and stuff shoppers within organization

userStory.narrative:
As a staff shopper and an admin shopper, I require the ability to
view only those orders that I placed myself within my order history
so I can view all purchase history.

title: VIR-238.02 Verify that the admin shoppers can view orders placed by admin and stuff shoppers within organization
